DevGroupFile.default: Panorama Device Group Configuration File Name

TemplateStackFile.default: Panorama Template Stack Configuration File Name

BootstrapBucketName.Description: S3 Bucket name for FW bootstrap configuration

BootstrapBucketRegion.Description: S3 Region where the FW bootstrap bucket is located

EnvironmentBucketRegion.Description: S3 Region where the Environment bucket is located

ADTemplateFile.Description: CloudFormation Template Path for Windows Domain Controller deployment

ServerKeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to VMs. Except NGFW and Panorama

AdminPassword.Description: Password for NGFW/Panorama admin user, Windows DC admin and users. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

PanoramaSerial.Description: Panorama Serial Number (provided by Palo Alto Networks)

AppHostedZone.Description: DNS Domain Name or Route53 Hosted Zone Name (i.e. appframework.mycompany.com)

FirewallCertURL.Description: Firewall CA Certificate for SSL Decryption (download URL)

DomainNetBIOSName.Description: NetBIOS name of the domain (up to 15 characters) for users of earlier versions of Windows (i.e. APPFRAMEWORK)

UseAppFrameworkDomain.Description: Use AppFramework provided domain? (if you don't have your own domain)

Company.Description: Your company name for AppFramework provided domain (yourcompany.dev.appframework.rocks) [alphanum, no spaces, lowercase, min 3 max 16 chars]

apiKey.Description: API Key (provided by Palo Alto Networks) for AppFramework provided domains

CreateDNSRecords.Description: Dynamically map FQDNs to EIPs using Route53?

ADServer1InstanceType.Description: Amazon EC2 instance type for the Windows Domain Controller instance

ADServer1NetBIOSName.Description: NetBIOS name of the Windows Server (up to 15 characters)

DomainAdminUser.Description: User name for the account that will be added as Domain Administrator. This is separate from the default "Administrator" account

DomainDNSName.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the AD root domain (i.e. appframework.local)

QSS3BucketName.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
QSS3BucketName.Description: S3 bucket name for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

QSS3KeyPrefix.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/).
QSS3KeyPrefix.Description: S3 key prefix for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/).

RestoreModePassword.Description: Password for a separate Administrator account when the domain controller is in Restore Mode. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

WebGenConfURL.Description: Web Traffic Generator Configuration File URL
